headline: The U.S. and Ivy League schools were late to respond to COVID-19.
byline: By Charlotte Li Edited by Jun Yi Zhang

top.value: When Chaitanya Reddy Gurijala, a Computer Science Master’s Student at Stony Brook university lost his internship, he knew he wasn’t the only one.

So he took to twitter and started the account @hiring2020. The twitter bio reads a simple mission: “Information about internships and full-time jobs for college students.” Gurijala is on a mission to collect and distribute information about the hiring status of student internships and jobs amid the pandemic.

body.value: Leadin. Something to draw the reader in. Graphics is the only visuals and words desk at the Spectator.
Nutgraf. What is the meat of the story? Why does this matter?
